featured.copy: dutchie is an online marketplace that connects consumers with their favorite local dispensaries and allows them to place an order for pickup or delivery.

work.name: uber
work.copy: Uber’s “Moving Forward” campaign was a crucial project in their branding strategy. I was proud to contribute in bringing their animations to life.

work.name: ledgers
work.copy: Two years and two rewrites later, this small web application has turned into a full Saas real estate tracking system. This personal project has continued to teach me more about development than I could have imagined.

work.name: lays
work.copy: The Lay’s Smile project was my first AR development project which involved me putting someone else’s smile on MY face! This project was a blast to work on and I am thankful that I was a part on the 14Four team that built it.

work.name: rocktech
work.copy: Rocktech is an international company and with that, there were plenty of new challenges. From communication to high availability, Rocktech helped me grow tremendously as a professional developer.

work.name: brand-content
work.copy: Brand Content was one of my first projects at 14Four. A complete .com, Brand Content has a special place on this list.

work.name: toyota
work.copy: With new and exciting challenges every season, the Toyota Sales Events have up to 70,000 versions running at a time. I am proud to have played a key role in the creation of what has been named the “banner system”.
